response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, we are confident it will exceed your expectations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $11,000, which is a significant discount compared to its market value of $12,000. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
